item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Boris Vallejo and the Pixel Art of the Demoscene (75 points | 25 comments)
2. Bop Spotter (1718 points | 306 comments)
3. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (58 points | 18 comments)
4. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (110 points | 13 comments)

7. AI chipmaker Cerebras files for IPO to take on Nvidia (118 points | 70 comments)

10. Fix photogrammetry bridges so that they are not "solid" underneath (31 points | 1 comment)
11. Essential Node in Global Semiconductor Supply Chain Hit by Hurricane Helene (11 points | 1 comment)

14. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (136 points | 19 comments)
15. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (144 points | 34 comments)

19. A Comprehensive Analysis of Package Hallucinations by Code Generating LLMs (9 points | discuss)
20. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (96 points | 46 comments)
21. Show HN: Venator – open-source Threat Detection Platform (9 points | discuss)
22. Two new books on John Calhoun and his rodent experiments (95 points | 53 comments)
23. The best browser bookmarking system is files (165 points | 124 comments)
24. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (419 points | 408 comments)
25. The fight to save Chile's white strawberry (89 points | 26 comments)
26. How we built ngrok's data platform (141 points | 38 comments)
27. Typewise (YC S22) Is Hiring a Senior AI Back End Engineer (Python, Europe) ( | hide)
28. NotebookLM's automatically generated podcasts are surprisingly effective (840 points | 439 comments)
29. A Taxonomy of Tech Debt (2018) (270 points | 73 comments)
30. Peer Calls: WebRTC peer to peer calls for everyone (107 points | 32 comments)
